name: Galactic Fighters (itch) (Lucas Schierholt)
description:
A multiplayer PvP shooter for up to 4 players, set in a 2D sci-fi universe, where players use weapons they find on the map to destroy their opponents. The winner is decided in a best of X rounds.

This game was made using Unity and Photon Network as an academic project at Feevale University.

The team:

Giordano Jankovski;

Lucas Schierholt;

Luiz Andrade;

Monique Reis.
